mapper.select: select * from doctor where name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or pingying like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or full_surname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or abbre_surname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or full_firstname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or abbre_firstname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or description like concat('%',#{name},'%') limit 1,20
select * from doctor where faculty like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') limit 1,100
